text: Oh no! That sound!
I'm too late again!
I'm sorry Grace!
I'm sorry I'm too late...
again...
Human boy, listen to me very carefully!
I am Ylarus, God of Time.
Adan is destroyed again.
Everytime the wizard sacrifices the human girl you call Grace, Adan starts burning, ending all life. Including the wizard his own and yours.
Human boy, you must stop the wizard!
For Adan obviously, but also because of the connection you have with the human girl.
For that alone I have seen you will go the extra mile.
I have brought you back in time before, but my powers are weakening.
As of now I cannot do this much more.
That is why I put a part of my power in this crystal.
With this crystal you can reset time to 12 hours before the disaster.
Human boy, it is now yours to use.
As of the disaster itself, I do not have knowledge of the cause.
You must travel to the city of Lastdenn, for there you may find an answer to this cause.
The power of time is in your hands!
What the...
This is heavy.
Ylarus, the God of Time...
And I've only got 12 hours before the end of the world.
So that is tonight at half past seven.
I must use this crystal I got from Ylarus before that moment, because there will be no devine intervention anymore.
Alright, on to Lastdenn then, I guess.
